description: Finally an app that lets me enable use of my sound card on Ubuntu on my Alienware laptop. Many other features and settings controls.

Ubuntu does not have a default installation to switch between various sound outputs. 
This allows to switch headphones off without unplugging it and to switch speakers on instead. Under mixer choose auto-mute mode and from drop down list choose speaker only.
summary: Software Switch between headphone and Speaker

description: Occasionally crashes and feels very unpolished. I'd keep my eye on this as I wish linux took sound control more seriously.
summary: Gives you full control of your sound hardware

description: SOLUCIONA el problema de que se escucha solo por 1 Parlante; Hace y logra que se escuche en los 2 aún así usando PLACA DE SONIDO!
